data.name: Dreadnought: Legends #1 Digital Comic
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Sinley Bay, a storied haven for outcasts and outlaws that’s hidden deep within the asteroids of the Scum Belt. For a refugee called Mac, this bustling spaceport is the key to escaping a mysterious past—and unlocking a future of untold possibilities.

Get ready to explore Sinley Bay’s hive of black market traders, bottom-feeding gamblers, and mercenary ship captains. Hot up-and-comers David Accampo and Paul Montgomery (The Margins) have joined forces with Priscilla Petraites and Marco Lesko (Brilliant Trash) to create a tense, captivating sci-fi adventure inspired by Six Foot Games’ tactical shooter, Dreadnought.

Dive into a world of colossal ships, notorious captains, and courageous spirits to discover the most legendary outpost in the solar system.


Issue #1 cover created by celebrated, Eisner Award-winning artist Bill Sienkiewicz



Story by Coert Voorhees, David Accampo & Paul Montgomery
Script by David Accampo & Paul Montgomery
Art by Priscilla Petraites
Colors by Marco Lesko
Lettering & Design by David Accampo
Cover by Bill Sienkiewicz

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimální:
  • Operační systém: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Dodatečné poznámky: PDF Reader
